message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $16,000.  I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $16,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Can you meet me at $14,000?
Bob, you seem to recognize the value this product offers. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000? This is my final offer.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $13,500?
